panels.description: HTTP 5xx request errors 1 minute rate of change over the last 15 minutes

targets.query: SELECT derivative(mean("http_response.5xx")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'backend' AND "instance" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Backend HTTP errors rate

panels.description: Number of connections awaiting assignment to a backend server over the last 15 minutes

targets.query: SELECT mean("qcur") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'backend' AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Backend connections waiting

panels.description: Number of backend which status is different than 'UP'

targets.query: SELECT count("noup") FROM (SELECT last("status") as "noup" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "type" = 'server' AND "status" !~ /UP/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "sv", "proxy") fill(null)

panels.title: Number of backends in error

panels.description: The average requests queue time 1 minute derivative over the last 15 minutes.

targets.query: SELECT mean("qtime") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'backend' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Average requests queue time

panels.description: Frontend requests errors 1m rate of change over the last15 minutes.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("ereq")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'frontend' AND "proxy" =~ /^$frontend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Frontend requests errors rate

panels.description: Frontend denied requests 1m rate of change over the last 15 minutes.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("dreq")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'frontend' AND "proxy" =~ /^$frontend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Frontend denied requests rate

panels.description: Number of frontends which status is different than 'OPEN'

targets.query: SELECT count("noup") FROM (SELECT last(status) as "noup" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "type" = 'frontend' AND "status" != 'OPEN' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "proxy", "host") fill(null)

panels.title: Number of frontend in error

targets.query: SELECT ((mean("scur") / mean("slim")) * 100) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'frontend' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.description: Number of HTTP requests / sec

targets.query: SELECT mean("req_rate") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$frontend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"

panels.title: HTTP requests rate

panels.description: A status different than 'OPEN' should be acted upon

targets.query: SELECT "frontend", "status", "host" FROM (SELECT last(status) as "status", "proxy" as "frontend", "sv" as "sv", "host" as "host" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "type" = 'frontend' AND $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY "host", "proxy" fill(null))

panels.title: Frontends Current Status

panels.description: Number of HTTP responses / sec

targets.query: SELECT derivative(last("http_response.1xx")) AS "http 1xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$frontend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"
SELECT derivative(last("http_response.2xx")) AS "http 2xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$frontend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"
SELECT derivative(last("http_response.3xx")) AS "http 3xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$frontend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"
SELECT derivative(last("http_response.4xx")) AS "http 4xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$frontend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"
SELECT derivative(last("http_response.5xx")) AS "http 5xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$frontend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"

panels.title: HTTP responses

panels.description: Number of bytes sent  /sec

targets.query: SELECT derivative(last("bout")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$frontend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"

panels.title: Bytes sent rate

panels.description: Number of sessions created per second

targets.query: SELECT mean("rate") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$frontend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"

panels.title: Sessions rate

panels.description: Number of bytes received / sec

targets.query: SELECT derivative(last("bin")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$frontend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"

panels.title: Bytes received rate

panels.description:
Requests denied because of security concerns.
- For tcp this is because of a matched tcp
  request content rule.
- For http this is because of a matched http
  request or tarpit rule.

targets.query: SELECT derivative(mean("dreq")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'frontend' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Requests denied rate

panels.description:
Request errors. Some of the possible causes are:
- early termination from the client, before the
  request has been sent.
- read error from the client
   - client timeout
   - client closed connection
   - various bad requests from the client.
   - request was tarpitted.

targets.query: SELECT derivative(mean("ereq")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type" = 'frontend' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"

panels.title: Requests errors rate

panels.description: A status different than 'UP' should be acted upon

styles.linkTooltip: Click to see the HAProxy documentation

targets.query: SELECT "proxy", "status", "check_status", "sv"  FROM (SELECT last(status) as "status", "proxy" as "proxy", "check_status" as "check_status", "sv" as "sv" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "type" = 'server'  AND $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY "sv", "proxy" fill(null))

panels.title: Backends Current Status

targets.query: SELECT ((mean("scur") / mean("slim")) * 100) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND  "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(last("http_response.1xx")) AS "http 1xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"
SELECT derivative(last("http_response.2xx")) AS "http 2xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"
SELECT derivative(last("http_response.3xx")) AS "http 3xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"
SELECT derivative(last("http_response.4xx")) AS "http 4xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"
SELECT derivative(last("http_response.5xx")) AS "http 5xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"

panels.description: Number of bytes received by the backends / sec

targets.query: SELECT derivative(last("bin")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"

panels.title: Byes received rate

panels.description: Average backend response time (in ms) for the last 1,024 requests

targets.query: SELECT mean("rtime") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"

panels.title: Average response time

panels.description: Number of bytes sent / sec by the backends

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bout")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Bytes sent rate

panels.description: Number of times a connection was retried

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("wretr")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"

panels.title: Backend connection retries rate

targets.query: SELECT mean("qtime") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"
SELECT mean("qcur") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.description: Number of requests that encountered an error attempting to connect to a backend server

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("econ")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Backend requests errors rate

panels.description: Rate of requests whose responses yielded an error

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("eresp")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Backend failed requests rate

panels.description: Number of times a request was redispatched to a different backend

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("wredis")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy"

panels.title: Backend redispatchs rate

panels.description: Responses denied due to security raisons (ACL-restricted)

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("dresp")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Backend responses denied rate

panels.description: Current number of requests unassigned in queue

targets.query: SELECT mean("qcur") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$backend$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Number of requests unassigned

list.label: Hosts
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "haproxy" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: Frontends
list.name: frontend
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "haproxy" WITH KEY = "proxy"

list.label: Backends
list.name: backend
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "haproxy" WITH KEY = "proxy"
